titleStmt.title: A form of prayer to be used on Wednesday the twelfth day of March next ensuing, throughout the whole kingdom being the fast day appointed by the King and Queens proclamation, to be observed in a most solemn and devout manner, for supplicating Almighty God for the pardon of our sins, and for imploring his blessing and protection in the preservation of His Majesties Sacred Person, and the prosperity of His arms in Ireland, and the naval forces.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
